identity.name: CEnT-S Alert
identity.mission: Alert students instantly when a test spot opens.

usage_rules.background: Use #050505 for the main page background. No gradients.
usage_rules.status_available: Use #00FF94 (Neon Green) for 'Available' status and primary CTAs.
usage_rules.status_full: Use #FF3B30 (Neon Red) for 'Full' status and error states.
usage_rules.text: Headings in White (#FFFFFF), Body in Grey-400 (#9CA3AF).

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous spacing. Use p-8 or p-12 for cards. gap-6 or gap-8 for grids.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid: Main Status (col-span-2), History (col-span-1 row-span-2), Settings (col-span-2).
grid_system.landing: Single column centered hero, followed by 3-column feature grid.

layout_strategy.mobile: Stack everything vertically. Ensure touch targets are 44px+.

buttons.primary: bg-[#00FF94] text-black hover:bg-[#00CC76] font-bold rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,148,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#27272A] text-white hover:border-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-[#FF3B30] text-white hover:bg-[#CC2F26] rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4

cards.style: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#27272A] rounded-none p-6 or p-8. No shadow, just flat dark surfaces.

inputs.style: bg-[#050505] border border-[#27272A] text-white rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00FF94] focus:border-[#00FF94] h-12

status_indicators.available: w-4 h-4 rounded-full bg-[#00FF94] animate-pulse shadow-[0_0_10px_#00FF94]

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'scanline' or 'noise' overlay if possible, but keep it minimal.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are key. Use them to define structure.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use subtle drop-shadows with colored hues for active states (e.g., shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,255,148,0.3)]).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts to index.html.
2. THEME SETUP: Configure tailwind.config.js to use the specific neon colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Ensure 'dark' mode is forced or default.

3. LANDING PAGE: Build a high-conversion landing page. Hero section must use the 'hero_background' image with a dark overlay (bg-black/80) so text is readable. Headline: 'Never Miss a CEnT-S Spot Again'. CTA: 'Login with Google' (use a distinct style for this).
4. DASHBOARD: Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout. The 'Status Card' is the hero - make it big. If spots are available, the whole card should have a subtle green glow. If full, red.
5. ALERTS: Use Shadcn 'Switch' component for toggling Email/SMS/WhatsApp. Style them to match the neon theme (green when active).
6. HISTORY: Use a simple, dense table for notification history. Font: JetBrains Mono for timestamps and status.
7. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Status' is the first thing visible on mobile. Stack the history below it.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, toggles).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
